asmin tān goṣṭhe savitā ni yacchatu
mā asmān icchaḥ anāgasaḥ
pratibuddhāḥ abhūtana
upa tvā tiṣṭhantu puṣkariṇīḥ samantāḥ

masked: tasmāt āgneyīḥ eva manotāyai haviṣaḥ avadīyamānasya [MASK]
src: tasmāt āgneyīḥ eva manotāyai haviṣaḥ avadīyamānasya anvāha
svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai sampattyai saṃgatyai

masked: tasmai indraḥ [MASK] prītaḥ manasā hiraṇya ratham dadau
src: tasmai indraḥ stūyamānaḥ prītaḥ manasā hiraṇya ratham dadau
tiṣṭhata ilayata su kam

masked: kā rādhat [MASK] aśvinā vām iti nava vichandasaḥ
src: kā rādhat hotrā aśvinā vām iti nava vichandasaḥ
iyam vai oṣadhīnām pratiṣṭhā
somasya rūpam
sa gavayaḥ abhavat
namaḥ te jāyamānāyai

masked: upa enam yajñaḥ namati yasya evam [MASK] trīṇi ca śatāni ṣaṣṭim ca anvāha
src: upa enam yajñaḥ namati yasya evam vidvān trīṇi ca śatāni ṣaṣṭim ca anvāha

masked: ojasvī indriyavān vīryavān bhavati yaḥ evam vidvān [MASK] kurute
src: ojasvī indriyavān vīryavān bhavati yaḥ evam vidvān triṣṭubhau kurute
vidma śarasya pitaram parjanyam bhūri dhāyasam
sā agnau eva praṇīyamāne punar āgacchati
kṛṣṇājinam vai su tarmā nauḥ
aughaḥ ha tāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ niruvāha

masked: sa ha uvāca yadā vai kṣatriyaḥ sāṃnāhukaḥ bhavati atha sa [MASK] bhavati saṃnāham [MASK] prāpnotu atha tvā yajai iti
src: sa ha uvāca yadā vai kṣatriyaḥ sāṃnāhukaḥ bhavati atha sa medhyaḥ bhavati saṃnāham nu prāpnotu atha tvā yajai iti

masked: agniḥ [MASK] manmanā soma gīrbhiḥ tvā vayam iti yaḥ pūrvam ījānaḥ syāt tasmai
src: agniḥ pratnena manmanā soma gīrbhiḥ tvā vayam iti yaḥ pūrvam ījānaḥ syāt tasmai

masked: tvam hi agne agninā vipraḥ vipreṇa san satā [MASK]
src: tvam hi agne agninā vipraḥ vipreṇa san satā iti
paśubhiḥ eva enam tat samardhayati
etasyāḥ vai adhi indraḥ ajāyata
mā śakan pratidhām iṣum
tat puṣṭeḥ
saḥ eka vrātyaḥ abhavat
tathā iti

masked: tāni dvābhyām [MASK] tisṛbhiḥ tāni catasṛbhiḥ tāni pañcabhiḥ tāni [MASK] tāni saptabhiḥ na eva avārundhata
src: tāni dvābhyām tāni tisṛbhiḥ tāni catasṛbhiḥ tāni pañcabhiḥ tāni ṣaḍbhiḥ tāni saptabhiḥ na eva avārundhata

masked: eṣa grāvā iva jaritā [MASK] indra iyarti vācam bṛhat āśuṣāṇaḥ
src: eṣa grāvā iva jaritā te indra iyarti vācam bṛhat āśuṣāṇaḥ
sa dhanuḥ ādatta
bhūyasi haviṣkaraṇe upahūtaḥ iti

masked: evam eva etat yajñasya ubhayatas antayoḥ aprasraṃsāya [MASK] [MASK] yat ādityaḥ caruḥ prāyaṇīyaḥ bhavati ādityaḥ udayanīyaḥ
src: evam eva etat yajñasya ubhayatas antayoḥ aprasraṃsāya barsau nahyati yat ādityaḥ caruḥ prāyaṇīyaḥ bhavati ādityaḥ udayanīyaḥ
anukām asmai viśam a vivādinīm karoti
tastuvena arasam viṣam
